doc:
Christopher Rhodes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Rhodes 0 Sir Christopher George Rhodes, 3rd Baronet (30 April 1914 – 22 June 1964) was an English film and television actor. He was awarded the Croix de Guerre and the United States Legion of Merit for his Second World War service. Sir_Christopher_George_Rhodes , 3rd_Baronet ( 30_April_1914 – 22_June_1964 ) was an_English_film_and_television_actor . He was_awarded the_Croix de Guerre and the_United_States_Legion of Merit for his_Second_World_War_service .
